component.name: GitSyncMarks Mobile
component.summary: View and sync bookmarks from your GitSyncMarks GitHub repo

description.p: Cross-platform companion app for the GitSyncMarks browser extension. Sync bookmarks stored in a GitHub repository, browse them offline, and open URLs in your preferred browser.

ul.li: Sync bookmarks from GitHub (GitSyncMarks per-file format)
Expandable folder tree with recursive subfolder display
Drag-and-drop reorder and move bookmarks between folders
Encrypted settings sync compatible with the browser extension
Export and import settings with password protection
Configurable root folder for tab-based navigation

screenshot.caption: Bookmark list with expandable folder tree

description.p: Stable release. Settings Sync to Git (extension-compatible), move/reorder bookmarks, share link as bookmark, password-protected export/import, configurable root folder, auto-lock edit mode, delete bookmarks (long-press), post-import auto-sync, reset all data, import on empty state.
Browser selection, offline cache, multilingual support (EN, DE, FR, ES), CI/CD release pipeline for Android, Linux, Windows, macOS.
Initial release with bookmark sync from GitHub, expandable folder tree, settings screen, and favicon display.
